<yesno><close>

290398.「やめるんバね。\n ユーちゃんの髪型を 変えたくなったら\n いつでも 来ると:
If you ever want to change Lizy's hairstyle,
you can always come back!

292120.「艶もあり さっぱりした印象を受けますね。\n 手入れが 少々 大変そうですが\:
It looks fresh and shiny. It may be a little
difficult to maintain, but let's let Bud be

292121.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「柔らかく ふん:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>It looks soft and fluffy. It's easy to move
around, and my heart feels light.

292122.「普段の髪型に戻すと 気持ちが落ち着きますね。\n バドの編み込みの 手際の良さ:
I feel more at ease when I get my hair back to
its normal state. I am always amazed at how
well Bud braids my hair.

300381.「アクセントがついて 個性的になった印象です。\n それでいて 心にいっぽん 芯:
The accent gives the impression of individuality. At the same time, I also feel a sense of dignity, as if a core has been passed
through my heart.

304550.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「かわいらしく:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>She looks cute and lively. It's hard for me to
keep my hair up high, but thanks to Bud, I'm

310523.「神剣の名前を いただいた この髪型。\n その名前を汚さぬように \n 精進に:
This hairstyle was named after the divine
sword. I will strive to be diligent so as not
to tarnish that name.
